The Rangers of Lot Ch. 6 A New Threat
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Rangers of Lot Ch. 6 A New Threat
By Sturnum94 on Tuesday, September 12, 2006 - 02:53 pm:

Lot and Mahjor were battling it out. while that took place, Zagref was battling Hijora, the Great Betrayer.

"Zagref, you are a formidable opponent. But I will win in the end. HAHAHAAAA!!!" Zagref then rushed at Hijora with his soul saber. "You will fall, HIJORA!!!" Then, there was a big...BOOM!!! Everyone looked up. It was Lot. He had brought fire from the Heavens. Mahjor sent thousands of evil souls from Hell. Both were even in power. Mahjor then sent a black mist towards Lot. The monsters in it's path were immediatly desintigrated.

Lot used a very shiny shield type of energy to block this. Zagref, looking at Lot, was smashed by Hijora. "AAAAAAAAAHH!" Zagref was sent flying. He could see Hijora lunging at him. Then, out of nowhere, Soluv and Solon came and blocked him. They looked very weak, but they stood strong. "Soluv, Solon, NOOOO!" Hijora slammed by them, and Zagref sent vulcan fire out. Hijora had no problem dodging it. Then, a wounderous thing happened. Time stopped, and Zagref was floating. Everything was still. Even Mahjor. Lot came to Zagref, and touched him. Zagref instantly came to. "Zagref, are you okay?" Zagref looked confused. "Huh, what happened?" Lot chuckled. "I stopped time. To help you, you don't know it yet, but I will need you in the future."

"Now, get up Zagref," Lot said, "I will heal you." Lot healed Zagref. Then he clapped very thunderously. Time was back in line. Hijora was flying, and since Zagref was out of the way, he went a far way before realizing something was wrong. "What the..." But Hijora couldn't finish before Zagref smashed him with his sword.

When Hijora stood up, he said, "Hm, you are powerful, I will be back." Then Hijora disappeared in a black mist. Zagref was about to slam him in the face when Hijora disappered. "AAAAAHHH!!! HIJORA, come BACK!!!" Then, Zagref felt he was deaf, because he couldn't hear anything. He saw Lot had a massive ball of white energy obove him, and he shot it a Mahjor. Mahjor was instantly killed......

Zagref couldn't believe his eyes. Mahjor was defeated.....

He couldn't resist it..... He started to cry, happily. He saw Solon and Soluv doing the same. What they had been chasing for decades, was dead......

"Well, our mission in life.... is completed." The three saw Lot fading away..... He was talking in their minds. "Rangers, I have completed my mission. You have helped me in this mission. And for that, I thank you. You will all recieve a gift. Solon, you have recieved a seat in my gallery of heroes. Soluv, you also have a seat in my gallery of heroes. And Zagref, you are the most important. You have recieved the seat to my right hand. But I will need you to do one more thing. You must destroy Hijora, if you don't, the devil bloodline will continue. You have recieved your mission, now. Good bye." Every one of Mahjor's minions were relieved of their curses, but surprisingly, didn't die.

Songi came to the rangers. "Rangers, thank you for helping IMa destroy Mahjor. Now FIMBA and AGIMA can return to normal. What the...." The ranger's clothing turned to gold and silver. Their antlers was turned to the Seal of Lot. It was a "U" with a floating orb in the middle. It was gold. Shoes out of platnum, and arm braces out of gold. They all had scarfs with the Seal of Lot.

Now the Ranger's mission was to eliminate Hijora. He was probably the next in line of the devil gene. "I don't know where Hijora is, but we have to find him." Zagref said. I think I might know where he is", Soluv said, "But it is going to be tough......"

to be continued.....
